divs: Sighting DetailsThis account summary is being entered by GA Asst State Director Ralph O. Howard, Jr. because the sighting was reported directly to me (Howard) via a temporary 1-800 line installed as part of the investigation of a sighting associated with another nearby case. The narrative is based direectly on and is close to, the audio recording from the 800 line. ----------------------------------------------- I was driving home from my girlfriend���s, coming north on P���Tree Industrial Boulevard. Time about 3:15 AM. I took the exit for P���Tree Corners Circle and as I go onto that road headed north, I saw a brightly-lit something straight ahead, at a distance, above the trees. I thought it was a fire truck or rescue truck, I���m thinking ���what the heck is that?��� I kept an eye on it as I kept going, it was getting brighter as if maybe I was getting closer. It was huge, the size of a subdivision, with very bright red & white lights all over it. I couldn���t see a shape, it was dark and the lights just too bright. Finally, not believing this at all, I just brought the car to a complete stop. This was just before the intersection of Corners, with Holcomb Bridge Rd. I got my head out of the driver side window and got a good look at it. I just could not believe the size and brightness. It began or had just begun, to move, headed SE like towards Doraville. I turned right to get over to my house to get a camera but when I came back to that spot, it was gone.
Summary: Huge, very bright red & white-lit object over road close to my home, Norcross, GA.
